contents.text: Welcome to Turo, the San Francisco-based platform for booking unforgettable cars from local hosts around the world.
To browse and book available cars, press 1.
One moment please while we retrieve the latest car listings.

navigationGoals: Reserve an economy car in Los Angeles from July 10 to 12 for my business trip, budget $50/day.
Find and book a mid-size SUV near San Diego for a week-long trip to the VA hospital.
I want to query and filter available Tesla Model 3 listings in SF for autopilot and fast-charge options on July 30–Aug 2.
I need help browsing available cars and booking one for my trip next week.
Browse and book a compact car in San Francisco for next weekend.

contents.text: To speak with a reservation specialist, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a reservation specialist.

navigationGoals: Find out if I can have a Tesla Model 3 delivered to my office downtown next Friday.
Speak with a reservation specialist to arrange a car that can accommodate my service dog.
I need to speak with a specialist to add an extra driver profile and configure telematics data export.
I'd like to speak with a person to help me make a new reservation over the phone.
Get help applying my student discount code to a new reservation.

contents.text: To manage an existing reservation, press 2.
To modify or cancel your booking, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our booking support team.

navigationGoals: Extend my existing reservation by one day—change the drop-off date from June 20 to June 21.
Change my upcoming reservation’s pickup location to the nearest VA center.
I need to modify my reservation dates from July 20–23 to August 1–4 and adjust the digital geofence pickup window.
I want to change the dates on my current car booking.
Extend my existing reservation by one day.

contents.text: For questions about insurance or payments, press 2.
One moment please, connecting you to payments and insurance support.

navigationGoals: Confirm what insurance protection comes with my rental and how to upgrade to full coverage.
Get details on insurance coverage and payment options for adding roadside assistance to my current booking.
I need details on liability caps, deductible tiers, and how in-app payment tokenization is secured.
I have a question about the insurance and payment charges on my reservation.
Clarify the insurance coverage details for my current booking.
